Title: Enacts the New York city Caribbean steel pan educational music program act
Summary: Enacts the "New York city Caribbean steel pan educational music program act"; requires community school boards in the city of New York to authorize the use of school grounds in the summer months for use by any steel pan music organization to practice for the Labor Day Parade (West Indian Carnival); establishes a steel pan music curriculum or instruction for community school districts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "New York city Caribbean steel pan educational music program act"
